translations: v.运用，施加（影响）；努力，尽力（exert oneself）

sentences.sentence: A number of neurotransmitters exert their effects by first increasing cyclic AMP concentrations in target neurons.
sentences.translation: 许多神经递质首先通过增加靶神经元中的循环 AMP 浓度来发挥其作用。

sentences.sentence: In order to be successful he would have to exert himself.
We all know that when we exert ourselves our heart rate increases.
sentences.translation: 大家都知道，当我们竭尽全力时，心率会加速。
